snippet.title: In The Rural Village of Nagoro || 「名頃の農村で」Trailer
snippet.description:
Narrative through minimalist gameplay "interact button" to tell a story about Nagoro.

Nagoro Scarecrow Festival:
On the first Sunday of October each year, the village hosts a small festival in honor of the scarecrows and anyone is welcome to attend.
名頃かかし祭りの際は:
毎年10月の第一日曜日、村ではかかしにちなんだ小さなお祭りが開催され、どなたでも参加することができます

Songwriter & vocalist: Asami
https://www.youtube.com/c/lizu0110

Android game link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SohunStudio.InTheRuralVillageofNagoro

Steam:
Will update later
